heading: HB04307
0: AN ACT ESTABLISHING AN ALTERNATIVE EDUCATION FACILITY FOR LGBTs TO BE KNOWN AS LGBT SPECIALIST SCHOOL AND SITUATED IN THE CITY OF SAN JOSE DEL MONTE, BULACAN, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
mother-bill statusstatus: Approved by the House on 2018-05-15, transmitted to the Senate on 2018-05-17 and received by the Senate on 2018-05-17 Substituted by HB07392
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04307
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING AN ALTERNATIVE EDUCATION FACILITY FOR LGBTs TO BE KNOWN AS LGBT SPECIALIST SCHOOL AND SITUATED IN THE CITY OF SAN JOSE DEL MONTE, BULACAN, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ROBES, FLORIDA "RIDA" P.
DATE FILED : 2016-11-08
SIGNIFICANCE: LOCAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Referred to Stakeholders on 2017-02-09
          -DepED
      2. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2017-10-09
      3. Under study by the Technical Working Group(TWG) on 2017-11-06
      4. Recommendations submitted by the TWG on 2017-12-04
          -(In substitution of House Bills Numbered 2733, 3292, 3706, 4029, 4307, 4386 and 6039) Introduced by Representatives Gonzales (A.D.), Villarin, Romero, Romualdez, Belaro, Robes, Herrera-Dy, Villafuerte, Durano, Pineda, Violago, Lobregat, Sy-Alvarado, Catamco, Primicias-Agabas, Lazatin, Bravo (M.), Dalipe, Aumentado, Nieto, Belmonte (R.), Malapitan, Escudero, Garcia (J.), Santos-Recto, Go (M.), and Aggabao
      5. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2018-02-07
      6. Approved by the Committee on Appropriations on 2018-02-07
          -Substitute Bill to House Bill Nos. 2733, 3292, 3706, 4029, 4307, 4386, and 6039 was approved with amendment.
MOTHER BILL: HB07392
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON BASIC EDUCATION AND CULTURE ON 2016-11-14
SECONDARILY REFERRED TO THE COMMITTEE(S) ON HIGHER AND TECHNICAL EDUCATION
